inclusion.criterion: skeletally mature and at least 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: agreed to adhere to post-surgical medically prescribed activity limitations and/or physical rehabilitation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous surgery at the target or adjacent vertebral levels
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: active malignancy or patient with a history of any malignancy (except non-melanoma skin cancer) with recurrence within 5 years of surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma, but it is primary cardiac lymphoma and not active. Patient has a history of malignancy (Burkitt's lymphoma), but it was treated and there is no recurrence within 5 years.
